page.title: 16RECREATION IN WESTCOTT
page.content: {Recreation}in Westcott is said to be very poor. A survey showed 65% of the public in Westcott thought that there were insufficient sports facilities in the area. They would like tennis, badminton, squash and swimming to be available. Over 20 clubs exist, including {football, cricket, Guides, Scouts, {Brownies, Bowling, Darts, Snooker, {Bingo, Women's Institute, Youth {Club, Over-sixteens club. People travel to Guildford, Dorking, London for other activities. The{local Pubs}provide a focal point for the locals.{The Prince of {Wales}pub has facilities for snooker and darts and serves alcoholic drinks and bar snacks. Many people in Westcott enjoy {walking}in the beautiful countryside surrounding their village.
